evidence.claim: Elak Health is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring the security of health information.
The company utilizes FHIR standards for interoperability in their healthcare solutions.
Elak Health supports X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange in healthcare.
Reports suggest Elak Health employs HL7 protocols for data exchange in healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on X12 and HIPAA indicates relevance for API-first data exchange.
